segments.text: I am simply aghast at the amount of water flooding this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The single-basin sink is overflowing with an alarming efficiency.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams continuously from the faucet, completely unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a constant, shimmering sheet cascading over the front edge of the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see it pooling rapidly on the floor, spreading wider with every second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The poor wooden cabinets are being drenched, I can only imagine the damage being done.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a sickening sight, this waste of water and impending destruction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, her back mostly to the children, polishing a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems utterly oblivious to the rising tide around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her one foot is already submerged in the cold water, yet her face remains completely neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fearful of the electrical hazards that might arise from such a flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation makes me feel quite uneasy about the safety here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a disaster waiting to happen, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
